channel.title: General on Paul Hook
channel.description: Recent content in General on Paul Hook

item.title: My first blog post!
item.description: Hello! If you haven’t been able to tell by the website already, my name is Paul Hook. I am a fourth year Ph.D. student in the Human Genetics program in the McKusick-Nathans Institute of Genetic Medicine at the Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine. You can learn alittle bit more about me here, so I won’t go on and on in the inaugural blog post. One of the reasons I was driven to create a website/blog was the blog of one of my former Human Genetics program-mates, Shannon Ellis.
